description: Retrieve the MCP tool definition metadata for a given Xray-related tool. Useful for introspection, validation, and agent planning before tool invocation.

toolName.description: The exact name of the Xray MCP tool to retrieve metadata for (for example, new_xray_test, add_tests_to_folder).

name: get_xray_tool_metadata

outputSchema.description: The full MCP tool definition object, including name, description, inputSchema, and outputSchema.

description.description: Human-readable description of the tool purpose.

inputSchema.description: Input schema describing the parameters accepted by the tool.

outputSchema.description: Output schema describing the structure of the tool response.
